definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: In return (for it), I'll show you some picture books.
sentences.chinese: 作为报答，我将给你看一些画册。

sentences.english: Manual layout, product packaging and album design.
sentences.chinese: 产品说明书排版，产品包装和画册设计。

sentences.english: In the immediate aftermath of his death, the children made a dad-book of photos and drawings.
sentences.chinese: 得知父亲的死讯，孩子们做了一本爸爸相册和画册。

sentences.english: The picture-book is well worth reading.
Kay and Gerda looked at the picture-book full of beasts and of birds;
sentences.chinese: 加伊和格尔达坐着看绘有鸟儿和动物的画册。

sentences.english: Photographs can easily be made into giclee art reproductions.
sentences.chinese: 照片可以很容易地制作成画册专辑艺术复制品。

sentences.english: Stretcher bars for canvas giclee art reproductions are easy to assemble.
sentences.chinese: 艺术复制品的油画作品画册专辑担架酒吧都容易组装。

sentences.english: The production of this catalogue is in suspicion of the believability of print and media.
sentences.chinese: 这次画册的制作是对印刷和传媒的可信度的质疑。

sentences.english: She likes this picture book of ancient beauties.
sentences.chinese: 她特别喜欢这本画满了古装粉黛的画册。

sentences.english: May I look at your picture-book?
Creatup excellent for "Project Hope 20 years" doing album design.
sentences.chinese: 我们为《希望工程二十年》做得专题公益画册设计。

sentences.english: The humanistic and natural views constituted a spectancular pic-album.
sentences.chinese: 人文与自然景观成就了一本精美的画册。

sentences.english: The album of paintings is an indispensable data in publicity in business enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 画册是企业宣传不可缺少的资料。

sentences.english: These four large catalogue still lifes were painted this year-I hope the paint is completely dry.
sentences.chinese: 四幅大型画册静物，画于今年，希望它们已经干透了。

sentences.english: How long may I keep the picture-book?
sentences.chinese: 这本画册我可以借多久？

sentences.english: Look at those foreign brand clothing and photo album.
sentences.chinese: 看看国外那些品牌服装画册和图片。

definition: rough sketch (of a painting)/(of an official) to approve a document by signing it
books (in a library or bookstore)/CL:本[ben3],冊|册[ce4],部[bu4]
